mapper.select: SELECT * FROM _PROXY_SOURCE PS LEFT JOIN _PROXY_SOURCE_MAPSERVER PSMS ON PS.id = PSMS.id LEFT JOIN _PROXY_SOURCE_WMS PSW ON PS.id = PSW.id
SELECT * FROM _PROXY_SOURCE PS LEFT JOIN _PROXY_SOURCE_MAPSERVER PSMS ON PS.id = PSMS.id WHERE PS.type = 'mapserver'
SELECT PS.*, PSW.* FROM _PROXY_SOURCE PS LEFT JOIN _PROXY_SOURCE_WMS PSW ON PS.id = PSW.id WHERE PS.type = 'wms'
SELECT * FROM _PROXY_SOURCE PS LEFT JOIN _PROXY_SOURCE_MAPSERVER PSMS ON PS.id = PSMS.id WHERE PS.type = 'mapserver' AND PS.SELECTED = #{selected}
SELECT * FROM _PROXY_SOURCE PS LEFT JOIN _PROXY_SOURCE_WMS PSW ON PS.id = PSW.id WHERE PS.type = 'wms' AND PS.SELECTED = #{selected}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO _PROXY_SOURCE(ID, NAME, TYPE, SELECTED, IS_DEFAULT) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{selected}, #{isDefault})
INSERT INTO _PROXY_SOURCE_MAPSERVER(ID, REQUEST_MAP, REQUEST_LAYERS, MAP_SERVER_BINARY, MAP_SERVER_WORK_DIR) VALUES(#{id}, #{requestMap}, #{requestLayers}, #{mapServerBinary}, #{mapServerWorkDir})

INSERT INTO _PROXY_SOURCE_WMS(ID, CONCURRENT_REQUESTS, WMS_OPTS_VERSION, HTTP_CLIENT_TIMEOUT, REQUEST_URL, REQUEST_MAP, REQUEST_LAYERS, REQUEST_TRANSPARENT, SUPPORTED_SRS) VALUES(#{id}, #{concurrentRequests}, #{wmsOptsVersion}, #{httpClientTimeout}, #{requestURL}, #{requestMap}, #{requestLayers}, #{requestTransparent}, #{supportedSRS})
